Description:
STOP THE NO. 1 CAUSE OF HAIR BREAKAGE
This leave-in conditioner has double the fortifying power. When shaken, it creates the perfect balance that ends shedding, eases detangling, and protects hair around-the-clock.
Did you know that your hair breaks more when its wet and that less breakage means stronger, longer hair? So stop snapping and start growing with this fortifying leave-in conditioner, made with strengthening Monoi Oila repairing Tahitian blend of Tiare Gardenia, Coprah Coconut Oil and Coconut Watera nutrient-rich blend of vitamins and minerals. When shaken, they blend to create the perfect balance to end shedding, ease detangling, and protect around-the-clock. Finally, you can keep hair on your head, and out of your brush.
Short Description: This leave-in conditioner has double the fortifying power. When shaken, it creates the perfect balance that ends shedding, eases detangling, and protects hair around-the-clock.
Instructions: Shake well, making sure the two parts have fully combined. Hold 6 to 8 inches away from wet hair and spray all-over to strengthen and detangle. Do not rinse out.
Ingredients:
NO PARABENS, NO PETROLEUM, NO MINERAL OIL, NO ARTIFICIAL COLORS
Water (Aqua), Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Isododecane, Pentylene Glycol, Agave Americana Leaf Extract, Butylene Glycol, C11-15 Pareth – 7, C12–16 Pareth – 9, Coconut (Cocos Nucifera) Fruit Juice, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus Extract, Dicetyldimomium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Gardenia Tahitensis Flower Extract, Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Starch, Lactic Acid, Methyl Gluceth-20, Panthenol, PEG-8 Dimethicone, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Trideceth-12, Trimethylsiloxyamodimethicone, Methylisothiazolinone, Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance (Parfum)

Description:
92% STRONGER HAIR FOR HEAT-STYLED, COLOR-TREATED AND RELAXED HAIR.
This lightweight, silicone-free, miracle oil reverses and prevents damage to even the most distressed hair caused by heat-styling, color-treating and chemical straightening.
Protect your hair from all damage. Its strengthening power comes from Monoi Oil  a sacred Tahitian blend of the Tiare Gardenia Flower and Coprah Coconut Oil. This silicone-free, restorative oil rebuilds your hairs structure from the inside out for true repair that doesnt wash away or weigh hair down like silicones do. Its also blended with Mirabelle Plum Seed Oil to restore health and Kukui and Rose Hip Seed Oils to reduce frizz and boost your hairs natural shine. Take your hair to its maximum strength and length  no matter what you do to it.
Plus, No Silicones, No Parabens, No Petroleum, No Mineral Oil, No Artificial Colors

Description:
Newer Softer Sent
A rich moisturizing cream that quickly and easily absorbs into your curls, coils, kinks and waves to leave them defined, glossy and frizz-free.
Cocoa & Shea Butters intensely rehydrate your hair
Soybean Oil leaves hair softer and stronger than before
Agave Nectar keeps moisture locked in for better definition and frizz control

Dry hair = frizzy curls! So, protect your hair from frizz situations  breakage, thirst and unmanageability  with the Original Leave-In Moisturizer. It has all the goodies you know and love, like Cocoa and Shea Butters to intensely hydrate your hair, plus Soybean Oil to soften and strengthen it. Weve also added Agave Nectar to ensure that your curls, coils, kinks and waves keep moisture locked in and are extra-healthy. Your hair will never get enough of this deep-moisturizing stuff. Hydrate your curls, coils, kinks and waves to make frizzy, unmanageable hair a thing of the past. Use Hair Milk Original Leave-In Moisturizer if you can never get enough moisture in your hair.
Short Description: Dry hair = frizzy curls! So, protect your hair from frizz situations – breakage, thirst and unmanageability – with the Original Leave-In Moisturizer. It has all the goodies you know and love, like Cocoa and Shea Butters to intensely hydrate your hair, plus Soybean Oil to soften and strengthen it. We’ve also added Agave Nectar to ensure that your curls, coils, kinks and waves keep moisture locked in and are extra-healthy.
Instructions:
WHICH HAIR MILK LEAVE-IN MOISTURIZER IS RIGHT FOR YOUR HAIR TYPE?
If you find your hair feeling dry all the time, or it dries out as the day goes on, give Hair Milk Original Leave-In Moisturizer a try.
If you worry about products leaving hair greasy, or your roots get weighed down quickly, try the Hair Milk Lite Leave-In Moisturizer instead.
DIRECTIONS:
After co-washing, apply a quarter-size amount into soaking-wet hair, working it in evenly with your fingers. Use your hands to gently squeeze out excess water or use a cotton T-shirt for best results. Add more as necessary and style as desired. 


DON’T SKIP THE MOISTURIZER…EVER
Curls need extreme moisture—much more moisture than straight hair. It’s hard for natural oils, produced by the scalp, to make their way down to the ends of a coil; this is why curly hair is usually more dry, brittle and frizzy. The key is using good moisturizing products that will soak into each strand. Well-moisturized curls have better definition and maintain styles longer, so don’t forget this step.

Applying leave-in moisturizers to wet hair makes it a hundred times easier. When hair is wet, the moisturizer will work in much more quickly and evenly through your curls and prevent it from tangling.

Cream moisturizers are great for curly hair because their nourishing ingredients coat and work to seal-in moisture. Also, they won’t evaporate throughout the day, so you won’t need to rehydrate again and again as the day goes on.
Ingredients:
NO PARABENS, NO PETROLEUM, NO MINERAL OIL, NO ARTIFICIAL COLORS
Cocoa & Shea Butters intensely rehydrate your hair
Soybean Oil leaves hair softer and stronger than before
Agave Nectar keeps moisture locked in for better definition and frizz control
Hair Milk Original Leave-In Moisturizer:

The secret is, the less trims you need, the longer your hair can grow, and faster! Description: The Curly Girl manifesto written by curl enthusiast Lorraine Massey has been revised, updated and expanded! Product Name: Arc AnGEL Firm Hold Defining Gel
Description:
A firm hold moisturizing and dening gel that dissolves instantly when applied to wet hair and dries forming a moisture-protective cast to enhance curls.

Ingredient Highlights
Orange Peel, Wheat, Soy

Complementary Products
DevaCare No-Poo, DevaCare One Condition, DevaCurl Mist-er Right

Styling Tips
Resist the urge to touch your curls once youve applied DevaCare Arc AnGEL. This rule is particularly important on frizz prone days.

Recommended for Curl Types
Swavy, Wavy, Botticelli, Corkscrew
Short Description: A firm hold moisturizing and deﬁning gel that dissolves instantly when applied to wet hair and dries forming a moisture-protective cast to enhance curls.
Instructions: Tilt head forward.  Scrunch wet curls in an upward motion.  Apply gel between palms and glide through hair.  Scrunch upward toward the scalp to define curls.  Once dry, scrunch curls again to release cast to reveal beautiful curls.

Description: Finally the ultimate ultra conditioning super soft daily curl wash especially made for us - dry, parched, damaged, used and abused, chemically treated, color treated, natural, kinky, curly hair. Short Description: You can never wash your hair too much with this carefully formulated non-sudsy cleansing crème. Excellent for curlies who want clean freshly prepped supple tangle free hair that's ready to receive any Miss Jessie's styling product.
Instructions: A quality hair cleanser is paramount to the integrity of your natural hair. In addition to keeping your hair free from dirty and product build up, a quality hair cleanser will contain ingredients meant to improve the look, strength, and texture of hair. This is particularly important to those of us with curly hair. The more friction that occurs in your hair the more it will tangle and frizzle.

Brand Description:
Miss Jessie was the paternal grandmother of Miko and Titi Branch, founders of Miss Jessie's Natural Hair Products and Salon. A proud southern matriarch, Miss Jessie was the most "tell- it- like- it- is" woman her family ever knew. She was also the "cookinist" woman in Poughkeepsie, chuckled her granddaughter Titi.
Never one to hold her tongue, Miss Jessie reserved her most colorful commentary for two subjects: good food and good grooming. It wasn't uncommon that her food and natural hair preparations contained some of the same ingredients. If Miss Jessie couldn't find what she wanted in a local shop, she'd figure out a way to make it herself (right at her kitchen table).

Description:
The Best Darn Detangling Shampoo. Period. The First Lady of Curls has more goodies in her bag. Gotta have suds? Miss Jessie's is giving it to you with her triple slip, extra detangling moisturizing formula. After popular demand Miss Jessie's is excited to introduce her new ultra soft detangling shampoo, Super Slip Sudsy Shampoo! This soft, lathering shampoo is excellent for every type of hair in need of a good super moisturizing cleansing! Whether you're naturally curly hair, kinky, wavy, straight, relaxed, color processed or chemically treated Miss Jessie's Super Slip Sudsy Shampoo was made especially for you.




Super Slip Sudsy Shampoo a super concentrated formula adds shine and manageability to hair without weighing it down or leaving behind residue. It removes product build-up and dirt while detangling knots and leaving hair slickety, slippery smooth and shiny!! It also restores a healthy balance to the scalpessential for encouraging hair growth and vitality. The enticing green apple scent makes it a yummy addition to your daily shower regimen!

Description:
Miss Jessies highly anticipated leave in conditioner LEAVE-IN CONDISH is here.
Leave-In Condish is Miss Jessie's lightweight leave-in conditioner and detangler that acts as the ultimate frizz fighter and moisturizer for every type of curl. But Leave-In Condish does more! Leave-In Condish is also an essential styling prep that coats your curls and locks in an extra layer of moisture protection before you apply your favorite Miss Jessies styler(s). Leave-In Condish will leave your curls super shiny and uber soft without any ugly oil build up. Styling is so simple.
Short Description: More than any other natural hair type, women with curly hair must condition every time they shampoo. Women with curly hair battle hair that, at times, is difficult to straighten, curls tighter in humidity, and refuses to stay soft. Knowing how to best condition your hair helps with many of the struggles some face with naturally curly hair.
Instructions: Squeeze a quarter-size dollop of Leave-In Condish™ into palm, and apply it section by section to damp (not wet) hair. Then, comb or finger rake through for extra detangling and add your favorite Miss Jessie’s curl styler. Let curls air dry or for bigger and more dramatic curls, use a hand held hairdryer with the Miss Jessie's Defrizz Difusser attachment. To refresh curls, dampen hair and repeat previous steps.

Taliah started the World Natural Hair, Health & Beauty Show™ which started with approximately 25 exhibitors and 150 attendees which has grown to over 140 exhibitors and over 30,000 attendees. The World Natural Hair, Health & Beauty Show™ is now in its 15th year with two shows per year, a Spring show and a Fall show. Description:
This Sulfate-free formula is a gentle yet effective conditioning wash that leaves hair feeling light and free of residue and product build-up. Herbal extracts of Chamomile, Ginger and Seaweed have been infused into this recipe to cleanse the hair gently without stripping it of essential oils. In addition, Palm oil and silk conditioners coat the hair to repair, protect and improve manageability.

Your hair is going to love this wash!
Short Description:
This Sulfate-free formula is a gentle yet effective conditioning wash that leaves hair feeling light
and free of residue and product build-up.
Instructions:
Thoroughly wet hair and apply a liberal amount of Clean & Natural Herbal Hair Wash into your hands and apply to hair closest to the scalp. Apply more Clean & Natural Herbal Hair Wash to your hair and massage into lather. Massage into hair and scalp. Rinse and repeat. Towel dry and apply a small amount of The Great Detangler for conditioning.

Use the Curl Sealer or the Curly Curl Cream for frizz-free styles that last all day.

Description: Taliah Waajid African Healing Oyl eliminates dryness, coats hair and adds sheen.
Short Description: This is a multi-use product that can be used on both the hair and body.
Instructions:
For use as a hot oil treatment: After shampooing the hair using the Total Body Black Earth Shampoo, towel dry the hair. Section off the hair and apply the African Healing Oyl to the hair and scalp. Cover with a plastic cap and sit under a dryer for 15 minutes on medium heat. Rinse and condition the hair use the Enhancing Herbal Conditioner.

For use on skin: After showering or bathing apply to body and feet to eliminate dry skin. African Healing Oyl can also be used as a moisturizer for hands and cuticles; simply rub into the skin anytime dryness occurs.

Description: The Medicated Bodifier works to eliminate that itching feeling of, "ooh I have to scratch my scalp!" The Medicated Protective Mist Bodifier immediately soothes the scalp and gives a cooling feeling that helps stop that itchy feeling. Great to use inbetween the parts of braids, locks, twists, weft weaves and interlocking. Because of the conditioning and moisturizing of the Protective Mist Bodifier, you can still use directly on your hair as well.
Short Description: The Medicated Protective Mist Bodifier immediately soothes the scalp and gives a cooling feeling that helps stop that itchy feeling.
Instructions:
Use after herbal conditioner at least three times a week on braids, locks, twists, natural styles and hair transitioning from chemicals to natural.

Directions for daily conditioning: Spray on scalp and hair from the root to the ends. Use at least three times a week for best results.

Directions for comb out/detangling: After completing steps 1-3 of the black earth system, towel dry hair and separate into large plaited sections, start at the nape area and un-plait one section at a time. Apply protective mist bodifier to the hair in the un-plaited section. Comb through using a large toothcomb. Comb out from the ends and work up to the roots.

Description: Flake-free concentrated setting lotion formulated to hold natural hairstyles in place longer. Great for straw sets, two-strand twist sets and lock styling sets. Can also be used on chemically relaxed hair.
Short Description: Flake-free concentrated setting lotion formulated to hold natural hairstyles in place longer.
Instructions:
Directions for wet sets: Condition hair with enhancing herbal conditioner, rinse and towel dry. Section off a few locks. If the locs are thick, it is best to section off less locs per roller. Apply crinkles & curls to cover the section of locks to be rolled. Use end papers to avoid hair breakage. Begin setting the hair from the tip of the locs and roll towards the roots of the locks. Braid or twist the hair for crinkle/crimp style. Sit under dryer until hair is dry.

Directions for dry sets or overnight sets: Section off locks to be set. Apply crinkles & curls directly to the locks. Begin to roll the hair starting at the tip of the locks and roll towards the roots. Braid or twist the hair for crinkles/crimps. Undo once hair is dry.
Ingredients: Water (Aqua), DMDM Hydantoin, Cocamide D.E.A., Styleze, Silwax, Sage (Salvia Officnalis), Diazolidinyl Urea, Caltaine-C, Vitamin-E, (Tocopheryl), Indian Hemp, (Cannabis Sativa) Peg8 Dimethicone, Nettle (Citrus aurantium Amara) Tea Tree Extract, (Melaluca Alternifolis), Jasmine, (Jasminum officinale), Aloe Vera (Aloe Babadensis), Fragrance (Parfum).

Description: Miss Jessie's understands. You are not quite ready for the "Big Chop" because you want to keep the length of your relaxed hair, but you are ready to go natural. The most bewitching challenge for transitioning form relaxed to natural hair is managing and styling these two very different textures at the same time. What you need is Miss jessie's Transitioner's Magic! This innovative and phthalate-free hair elixir will moisturize your new natural growth, revive and coat tour relaxed hair as well fight frizz and prevent curl shrinkage. Why does it work? Transitioner's Magic is a unique potion that acts as a styler and a leave-in conditioner. Transitioner's Magic provides super soft hold, natural shine, and needed moisture.
Short Description:
A magical styling potion with soybeen + Avocado!!
"The best darn transitioning styler. Period."
Excellent for this and more: Guiding you through a transitional phase with ease, Rod sets, Twist outs, Braid outs, Go to styler for wash N' go
Safflower oil, Avocado oil, Wheatgerm oil, Spirulina maxima extract, Soybean seed extract, Laminaria Digitata, Pumpkin seed extract, Love Love Love!!
No animal Testing!
Instructions: It is as easy as "Abracadabra!" For wash n' go styling simply divide your damp (not wet) hair into six equal sections, then generously apply Transitioner's Magic to eash section making sure to thoroughly coat your hair from root to end. Then allow curls to air dry or blow dry with the Miss Jessie's Defrizz Diffuser to encourage a fuller curl. Presto! Your hair will become soft and shiny. Description:
Cantu Shea butter leave in conditioning repair cream is an intensive deep penetrating leave in cream conditioning treatment that is made with pure shea butter and other natural oils to stop and mend breakage, repair split ends, and add manageability and shine with every application. For severely damaged, dry or coarse hair
Helps stop and mend hair breakage
Instructions:
Daily Styling--Apply to towel dried hair. Work a generous amount of product into hair beginning at the roots and working towards the ends. Comb through for even distribution. Do not rinse. Apply more to longer hair at the ends or problem areas.

Leave In Treatment--Apply as directed for "Daily Styling" just after shampooing. Reapply and cover with a plastic cap overnight for maximum absorption and intensive conditioning.

Frizz Free Hair--Apply daily to split ends or damaged areas. Comb through, and let dry naturally.

Product Name: Chocolat Smoothing Blow Dry Styling Cream
Description:
You hair should behave how you style it, right? Say so long to coarse, unmanageable frizz by rebuilding your hair so it's naturally smoother and effortlessly silky while providing Thermal Protection from blow dryers and flat irons. The Chocolate Smoothing Blow Dry Cream freezes your sleek styling into place as you blow-dry and flat iron so you can have unmatched, lasting control. Added to the frizz-fighting Cacao Extract - a deliciously rich variety from West Africa and South America - are follicle-restoring vegetable proteins to transform unruly strands into a mink-like mane that behaves just as your blow-dry intended: enviably smooth.
Get up to 70% less frizz that stays smooth for 72 hours, After just 1 use!*
Formulated Without:
Parabens
Synthetic Fragrances
Synthetic Dyes
Petrochemicals

Brand Description: For years, multi-cultural people with hard to manage hair traveled from store to store, trying to blend products in a hopeless attempt to tame their locks. Wendi LEVY (left) and Kim ETHEREDGE (right), two "mixed chicks", created a product line because they needed it. Then, something happened...friends and family started encouraging them to package it, and soon they had a full blown business running out of the garage. After a little door to door hustling, a few celebrity endorsements, and a ton of online customer support, MIXED CHICKS is bringing their products to the world.

Description: Aunt Jackie's Oh So Clean! Moisturizing & Softening Shampoo 12oz Treat your chronically dry hair to this lather-rich, deep moisturizing hair bath. Enriched with Coconut Oil, Shea Butter and Extra Virgin Olive Oil, tresses become super clean, soft, hydrated and easier to comb.

Towel dry and follow with IN CONTROL "Anti-Poof" Moisturizing and Softening Conditioner.

Description: Tame, nourish and deep condition frizzy, hard-to-manage, dehydrated, brittle natural curls, coils and waves with natural extracts and proteins. Gentle humectants moisturize and hydrate. It's an excellent restorative treatment for any type or texture, including natural, colored, relaxed, and texturized hair. Gentle enough to be used daily after shampooing. Enhanced with Shea Butter, Extra Virgin Olive Oil and Keratin to promote softness, strength, shine and pliability.
Short Description:
•Leaves Hair Smooth, Silky, Soft, & Manageable
•Massage Into Wet Hair After Shampooing
Instructions: After shampooing, towel dry and apply a generous amount of In Control by coating hair from roots to ends. As a daily or normal-use conditioner, leave on hair for 3 minutes, then thoroughly rinse and towel dry. As a reconstructive treatment for dry or damaged hair, cover hair with a plastic cap and sit under a hooded dryer for 10 minutes, then thoroughly rinse and towel dry. As a Co-Wash, thoroughly wet hair, and with fingers, massage scalp to lift impurities.  Then, completely coat hair with In Control and shampoo.  Rinse well and re-apply - this time, following directions above for a normal-use or reconstructive treatment, then towel dry.  For all uses, follow with KNOT ON MY WATCH Instant Detangling Therapy.

Product Name: Curl La La Defining Curl Custard
Description: Kiss frizzy, hard-to-tame hair good-bye. The mega-moisture humectants in Curl La La give long-lasting bounce to curls, and shine and definition to spirals and coils. Define your signature look by adding a little or a lot. Whatever your style, rest assure that it will be well-moisturized and soft to the touch, without caking or flaking. Use it as often as needed on wet or dry hair.
Short Description:
•Enriched With Shea Butter & Olive Oil
•For Natural Curls, Coils & Waves
•Sulfate-Free, Paraben-Free
•Adds Moisture And Shine
Instructions: For Scrunchy, Tight Curls, apply generously to wet or dry hair and use a diffuser while scrunching style into place, or allowing to air dry. For Elongated, Bouncy Curls or Spirals, apply to wet or dry hair, gently stretching curls with your fingers as you style, using a diffuser, hooded dryer or allowing to air dry.  For Coils, Braid-Outs and Twists, apply a small amount to sections of wet or dry hair, roller/rod set, braid or twist each section.  Sit under a hooded dryer or allow to completely air dry, then release each section, finger styling into place.  Keep hair clean and healthy by shampooing, as needed, with OH SO CLEAN! Description:
Dr. Bonner's Magic "All-One" Organic Shikakai Conditioning Hair Rinse
Our organic conditioning rinse is nourishing and effective without synthetic ingredients, and is certified by the name Natural Organic Program that certifies organic food. The USDA organic logo is your guarantee of organic integrity.
Organic shikakai powder come from the seed pods of the small South Asian tree Acacia Concinna, and is widely used in India for soft shiny hair. Organic lemon juice, used traditionally in the west, rinses and tightens hair shafts for excellent manageability. Organic coconut, olive and hemp fatty acids moisturize for luxuriant hair.
Short Description: Certified organic to USDA National Organic Program standards, Dr. Bronner's Organic Citrus Conditioning Hair Rinse is nourishing and effective without any synthetic ingredients
Instructions: 1. Shampoo with your favorite Dr. Bronners soap. True soaps clean hair well but can leave a tangly look & feel; however 2. Rinsing with our new Organic Shikakai Conditioning Rinse results in spectacular look and feel! Just stir 1- 2 capfuls of this rinse into a cup of water, close eyes and slowly pour while massaging into hair. Keep hand combing hair until hair feels entirely sleek (30 seconds). Rinse out well. Repeat if necessary in extra hard water conditions or with longer ...
Ingredients: Organic lemon juice, organic shikakai powder, organic coconut oil*, potassium hydroxide**, organic olive oil*, organic fair deal hemp oil, organic jojoba oil, organic lemon oil, organic orange oil, citric acid, tocopherol.*Certified fair trade ingredients.**None remains after converting oils to fatty acids and glycerin.
Brand Description: Dr. Bronner’s Magic Soaps are synonymous with Old World quality and time-honored simplicity, which can be traced back to the family’s German-Jewish soapmaking tradition. Born in 1908 to a Jewish family that had been making soap since 1858, Emanuel Bronner was the third generation certified as a master soapmaker under the guild system of the time. In 1929, he brought his formulas for high-quality liquid and bar soaps to America, starting Dr. Bronner’s Magic Soaps in its current form in 1948.

Description: Our natural, firm hold styling-aid offers matte, residue-free grooming without weighing down hair or irritating scalp. Synthesizing botanicals meadow foam seed, cannabis sativa seed, and soybean with absorbent fatty acids for moisture, definition and texture. Scientifically blends Yucca and Aloe plant extracts to help prevent damage and protect. Natural fragrance and color.
Short Description: The ultimate volumizer and “thickening” aid, especially for fine hair, without the stiffness of a gel or spray. Massage into towel-dried roots and style. A firm hold can structure bangs, ponytail, up dos, and slick directions. It is also a great finish for the ends, creating texture and adding hydration. For more definition and protection, apply evenly through hair and smooth with a fine-tooth comb.
Instructions:
For all hair types.  After shampooing, apply to damp or dry hair.  Work through with fingers: a small amount for fine hair; more generous for thick, coarse, and dry hair.  Comb to slick or tousle with fingers.  Great for on-the-go styling.  Appropriate for color treated and processed hair.  
professional styling tips.
fine / thin hair. for volume, use fingertips to work pomade into roots—the lightweight texture will not weigh hair down, and gives great lift at the root.
control frizz / add texture. apply pomade to the bottom third of the hair strand. work a bit into damp hair to control frizz and get better definition.
curly hair. work pomade into the middle of the hair shaft towards the ends. when styling the front of your head—press remaining product into ends. tousle for desired look.
w/ sage styling cream. for more control, first apply sage styling cream and then finish with pomade, or mix both together before applying. finish your style. warm pomade in palms and skim gently over the surface of the hair, coaxing stray hairs into place.
messy / distressed look. work through the length of long damp or dry hair to get that messy, distressed look. use throughout for texture, or just on ends for shape and separation.
short hair. take a small amount and twist it through shorter hair for a piece-y, haphazard effect.
sleek / straight. comb pomade through damp hair from root to tip before blow-drying straight or gently flat iron for straight hair with texture and body.
Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Lanolin Wax, Beeswax, Cetearyl Alcohol, Tribehenin, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Glycerin, Vp/Va Copolymer, Ceteareth-20, Tridecyl Stearate, Neopentyl Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Extract, Cannabis Sativa Seed Extract, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Extract, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Extract, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Extract, Polysorbate 20, Peg-100 Stearate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Triethanolamine, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Disodium Edta, Caramel.

Brand Description: SheaMoisture was grown from the ground up on the legacy of our Grandmother, Sofi Tucker. The daughter of healers in Sierra Leone and a widowed mother at 19, Grandma Sofi made handmade shea butter, African black soap, and other natural remedies, selling them in local villages to support her family. Her salves and soaps were soon sought after across the countryside - and four generations later, in the hands of her grandson Richelieu Dennis, her recipes and wisdom form the heart of SheaMoisture. Today, every one of our formulas harness the healing power of Shea Butter and the best of Mother Nature to nourish every member of your family, body and soul.

Brand Description: Founded by the owners of Sundial Brands in 2012, and incorporated as a 501 (c) (3) not-for-profit, public charity, the Sofi Tucker Foundation supports causes inspired by the woman whose life’s work forms the basis for Sundial Brands products. In 1912, as a young widow, Sofi Tucker sold African Black Soap and hand crafted Shea Butter based skin products in the village market and throughout the countryside of Bonthe, Sierra Leone. In her memory, the foundation provides financial grants to organizations that seek to economically empower women, their families and communities in the United States and in Africa.

Description: SHAMPOO hair with Conditioning Shampoo, massaging in for a minimum of 30 seconds. Rinse and repeat as needed. Pat dry gently with a towel to remove excess moisture. Detangle with a wide tooth comb. 2. TREAT hair, starting at nape of neck. Using 1 inch sections of hair, apply Hair Straightening Treatment to detangled hair, working through from roots to ends. Saturate entire head. Comb treatment into hair. Do not place hair behind ears or clip in any way. 3. Leave on for recommended time (See TIMING GUIDE below), periodically combing straight. Do not cover hair or apply any heat. Rinse hair thoroughly with warm water. 4. SHAMPOO hair as in step 1 to completely remove the treatment. Gently squeeze hair dry removing excess moisture. 5. CONDITION and PROTECT hair. Apply Rinse-Out Conditioner. Comb through hair gently, massage into scalp, then rinse hair thoroughly. 6. Blow dry hair straight with a brush until 90% dry. For a lasting super-straight style flat iron hair in small strips (no bigger than 1/2" wide) 3-5 times. * For lasting frizz control (NOT super-straight hair), follow steps 1 through 5 only. DO NOT APPLY HEAT. TIMING GUIDE Bleached Hair 5-10 minutes Color Treated 25-30 minutes Fine Hair 20-30 minutes Relaxed Hair 25-30 minutes Normal Hair 25-30 minutes Thick/Course Hair 35-40 minutes Notes  Do not apply treatment to dry hair.  Do not apply heat to hair during the straightening treatment.  After using SMOOTH & REPAIR HAIR STRAIGHTENING SYSTEM, wait 2-3 days before you wash and condition hair again. Weekly 1. NOURISH hair and scalp. Apply Hair & Scalp Weekly Therapy to wet or dry hair working from base through ends. Saturate entire head. Comb treatment into hair. Leave on for recommended time (20-40minutes). Rinse well. 2. SHAMPOO hair with Conditioning Shampoo, massaging in for a minimum of 30 seconds. Rinse and repeat as needed. Gently pat or squeeze hair dry to remove excess moisture. 3. CONDITION and PROTECT hair. Apply Rinse-Out Conditioner. Comb through hair gently, massage into scalp, then rinse hair thoroughly. 4. Blow dry as usual. Routine Cleansing and Conditioning 1. SHAMPOO hair with Conditioning Shampoo, massaging in for a minimum of 30 seconds. Rinse and repeat as needed. Gently pat or squeeze hair dry to remove excess moisture. 2. CONDITION and PROTECT hair. Apply Rinse-Out Conditioner. Comb through hair gently, massage into scalp, then rinse hair thoroughly. 3. Blow dry as usual. * Hair can be washed as often as you would like using the Maintenance Shampoo and Conditioner which are specially formulated to help maintain the life of the system, nourish your hair, reduce shedding and support hair growth. These plant based products are SLS free, SLES free, Sulfate free, PEG and PPG free, MEA. DEA and TEA free, Phthalate and Petroleum free, Paraben free, Formaldehyde free and free of artificial dyes. Additional Notes  This gentle system contains active protecting and restructuring proteins. These active proteins have a distinct odor that will dissipate after HEAT is applied to complete the bonding of these proteins to the hair.  This system is safe to use on color treated hair. It is Sulfate free and non-stripping. Transitioning into or away from a relaxer with this gentle system is trouble free.  Heat from your blow dryer and flat iron are a critical part of this sytem. The proteins used are heat activated, that is, the heat facilitates the bonding of the proteins to the hair providing protection, moisturizing and strengthening. The results are a smooth, shiny finish, lasting manageability and hair is healthier from the inside out.  The complete hair straightening system contains No Sulfates, No Parabens, No Phthalates, No Paraffin, No Synthetic Fragrance, No Mineral Oil, No Synthetic Color, NO DEA  No Animal Testing, No Lye, No Formaldehyde, No Formaldehyde Donors.  Please note, this system contains four different Proteins and is not Gluten free

Instructions: Do you want to switch up your look? Eliminate frizzy unmanageability hair or get super-straight hair without spending hours on frequent blow-outs, and then go back to your vibrant, bouncy curls…naturally! SheaMoisture's SMOOTH & REPAIR HAIR STRAIGHTENNG SYSTEM smoothes the surface of hair without permanently breaking bonds, so your natural hair texture gradually returns. This system - treatments, shampoo and conditioner - is designed to work synergistically to gently deliver smoother, straighter hair, while nourishing and protecting scalp and hair. Formulations include certified organic Shea Butter, which moisturizes and nourishes with fatty acids and vitamins. Four types of naturally derived proteins work to moisturize, condition, strengthen and protect the hair. Antioxidant-rich Tahitian Noni acts as a natural delivery agent for fragrant Monoi and nourishing Essential Oils that help promote healthy scalp and hair. No Lye, Formaldehydes or Formaldehyde donors. Description: "The Lace Wig Bible" is a MUST HAVE to include in the beauty kit of anyone who wears lace wigs! Women, men and stylists alike have become so knowledgeable that not only do they wear lace wigs, but they feel empowered to pass on the secrets inside "The Lace Wig Bible to their friends and clientele. This easy to follow, step-by-step, color coordinated companion guide makes learning about the do's and don't of lace wigs fun and informative. There is something new to discover on every page.
Short Description:

*164 Full Color Pages
*Over 200 Step by Step Full Color Images
*FAQ About Lace Wigs
*Embarassing Mistakes To Avoid
*Protecting Your Natural Hair
*List of Tools You Need
*AND SO MUCH MORE
Instructions: A Must Read!
Brand Description:
Morgan R. Gantt founded SWIGCH'D, her own collection of Premium Indian Remy Hair Extensions and Lace Wigs in 2011, to address the need for higher quality hair products. She has been wearing lace wigs for years, and has viewed them as a part of who she is, not what she is. Lace Wigs are extensions of whatever look she is trying to express, without the commitment or risk of damaging her natural hair.

Morgan has spoken to women around the world about their personal hair issues and concerns. She came to the conclusion that the root of the problem was the lack of education for women to make informed decisions about their hair.

Throughout her travels around the world, Morgan has found that women dealing with various hair conditions reached far beyond any economical or cultural issue. The Lace Wig Bible was written, not just for everyday women but also their stylists, whom deserve to look and feel their best.
Hair Style: Wigs
Hair Conditions: Oily Scalp,Pattern Baldness,Alopecia,Grey Hair,Split Breakage,Split Breakage,No, I don't have any hair conditions

Description: Forstyler Hair Professional Innovative Hair Products . Twister Hair Curler Hot Pink
Short Description:
Forstyler Hair Professional
Innovative Hair Products
Twister Hair Curler
Instructions:
1. Wash and comb hair. Dry the hair roots only, leave the rest damp.
2. Comb the hair and divide into four parts.
3. Attach the Twister to blow dryer and change the direction of the valve as desired, style each part for 2-3 minutes.
4. Assemble the cover and barrel to the Twister. Change the valve direction. Combine the two hair parts  and style to lock the ends. Repeat with remaining two parts.
5. Wait 5-7 minutes and go through with fingertips from the roots to ends. Apply any desired styling product for longer lasting results.
Brand Description:
Throughout history, in every culture, hair has played an important part in expressing beauty and power.
Hair generally represents how we desire to be seen by others. It’s a symbol of attractiveness, self- esteem and directly related to our mood.

Who we are?

Since 2009 ForStyler mission and passion is to create a beautiful hair, everyone should have the best hair!   We are team of young creative professional from beauty industry. Our main goal is to make an ordinary people feel extraordinary with innovative hair appliances in comfort of your home or on the go.

Brand Description: Founded by the owners of Sundial Brands in 2012, and incorporated as a 501 (c) (3) not-for-profit, public charity, the Sofi Tucker Foundation supports causes inspired by the woman whose life’s work forms the basis for Sundial Brands products. In 1912, as a young widow, Sofi Tucker sold African Black Soap and hand crafted Shea Butter based skin products in the village market and throughout the countryside of Bonthe, Sierra Leone. In her memory, the foundation provides financial grants to organizations that seek to economically empower women, their families and communities in the United States and in Africa.

Brand Description: In 2007 Rochelle went natural for the first time, with inspiration from her mother Marlene Moulton and her husband Demond Campbell she decided to stop chemically relaxing her hair and cut it all off. The first year of being natural was a learning experience, where she damaged her hair with over coloring. Then she faced an even greater issue there were no products that kept her hair moisturized. Most products on the market were filled with chemicals, false promises, and focused on the temporary look of styling rather than overall hair health. So again in December of 2008, she did another Big Chop but this time vowing to do it the right way. The biggest hurdle again became finding products to help her hair be healthy and grow longer. Also in 2008 Rochelle began designing eclectic jewelry and accessories and selling her handmade creations to the world after naming her line Nyamani Chic.
Product Tags: Essential 17 Hair Growth Oil, Alikay Natuals, Hair Loss, Itchy Scalp

Most products on the market were filled with chemicals, false promises, and focused on the temporary look of styling rather than overall hair health. So again in December of 2008, she did another Big Chop but this time vowing to do it the right way. The biggest hurdle again became finding products to help her hair be healthy and grow longer. Also in 2008 Rochelle began designing eclectic jewelry and accessories and selling her handmade creations to the world after naming her line Nyamani Chic.

Brand Description: In 2007 Rochelle went natural for the first time, with inspiration from her mother Marlene Moulton and her husband Demond Campbell she decided to stop chemically relaxing her hair and cut it all off. The first year of being natural was a learning experience, where she damaged her hair with over coloring. Then she faced an even greater issue there were no products that kept her hair moisturized. Most products on the market were filled with chemicals, false promises, and focused on the temporary look of styling rather than overall hair health. So again in December of 2008, she did another Big Chop but this time vowing to do it the right way. The biggest hurdle again became finding products to help her hair be healthy and grow longer. Also in 2008 Rochelle began designing eclectic jewelry and accessories and selling her handmade creations to the world after naming her line Nyamani Chic.
Hair Style: Relaxed Straight Hair ,Permed/Texturized Hair,Naturally Curly Hair, Naturally Straight Hair
Hair Conditions: No, I don't have any hair conditions

Description:
Hair Formula 37 has been a lifes passion for Mike Trobee since he worked for Nexxus Hair Care and Paul Mitchell Company over a span of 15 years. During that time his plate was full. He taught hair chemistry (disulfide bonds / acidification / Color theory, etc.) and noticed there was an unfulfilled need for hair supplements around 1995. With his extensive knowledge of hair chemistry he created Hair Formula 37 hair vitamins.

Hair Formula 37 hair vitamins are revolutionary in that they use synergy. Even today, few people understand how synergy works with supplements. Many brands talk about synergy but have no idea how it applies to vitamins.

It is all about the ingredients. It is all about synergy.

Synergy is where each part of the formula works together with the other parts to form an outcome greater than the whole. Hair Formula 37 is formulated with superior vitamins, minerals, and amino acids to use this synergy and get you the results you want.

Leading, directing, and still far ahead of any other supplement is Advanced Hair Formula 37 - hair vitamins for faster hair growth for women. We love our work here! We get to help you have longer, stronger, healthier hair, strong fingernails, and beautiful, radiant skin.
Instructions: Take 1 easy to swallow capsule twice daily with food.
Ingredients:
Vitamin A - Aids in the healthy development of hair and skin cells.
Vitamin C - Helps prevent breakage and boosts immune system
Vitamin D-3 - Improves the health of hair and stimulates hair follicles
Vitamin E - Antioxidant that repairs cells and damaged hair
Vitamin B-1 - Helps deliver nutrients throughout the body
Vitamin B-2 - Helps prevent hair loss
Niacin - Boosts circulation and stimulates hair follicles
Vitamin B-6 - Aids in absorption of Vitamin B-12 and Folic Acid
Folic Acid - Encourages healthy hair shaft cell development
Vitamin B-12 - Helps hair follicle cells regenerate
Biotin - Rejuvenates hair follicles and aids in the production of hair-building amino acids
Pantothenic Acid - Produces melanin and metabolizes nutrients
Iron - Promotes healthy red blood cells, prevents hair loss, and keeps hair thick
Iodine - Regulates thyroid gland and contributes to healthy hair, bones, and teeth
Zinc - Helps prevent greying hair and dandruff, crucial for healthy scalp
Copper - Repairs damaged tissue and promotes rapid hair growth
Manganese - Necessary for protein metabolism, prevents skin issues and slow hair growth
MSM - Vital for healthy tissues, aids in production of hair keratin
Inositol - Converts nutrients into energy and strengthens hair
L-Cysteine - Natural building block of protein, increases the length of hair
L-Methionine - Amino acid, improves the health and texture of hair
Silica - Accelerates the growth rate of hair and helps prevent split ends

Description: 12 Minute Deep Treatment Intensive Conditioner feeds and strengthens curls with a combination of essential amino acids, proteins, and effective moisturizers. It is the foundation for restoring and maintaining your hair's health and beauty. Due to a curl's tendency to lose nutrients and moisture, frequent deep conditioning is necessary to replenish the hair strength, allowing each strand to regain its internal weight and body and minimize the tendency to frizz. Used with heat, the mix of proteins and Amino Acids effectively penetrates hair to bond with the cuticle, leaving hair revived and restructured for enhanced performance. Essential for re-building over-processed or dried-out curls.
Short Description: 12 minute deep treatment intensive conditioner
Instructions:
Completely saturate clean, damp hair with 2 oz. of treatment on shoulder length hair - a bit more on longer hair. 
Cover with a shower cap and heat with blow dryer. Allow warm product to remain for 12 minutes. 
Before rinsing out, add a conditioner to hair. Then rinse both products; allow a little coating to remain.
Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Cetyl Alcohol, Sorbitol, Stearalkonium Chloride, Lactamide MEA, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Seed Oil, Panthenol (Provitamin B5), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydro-lyzed Soy Protein, Cystine Bis-pg-propyl Silantriol, Sodium PCA, Betaine, Glycine, Alanine, Proline, Serine, Threonine, Arginine, Lycine, Glutamic Acid, Myrist-amine Oxide, Polyquaternium-11, Butylene Glycol, Polyquaternium-59, Fragrance (Parfum), Disodium EDTA, Diazolidinyl Urea, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate

Description: Attain the ultimate moisture, definition and curl control with Curl Definer Custard! - Non-flaking hold and curl control

- Stretch curls withouth the sticky build up
Instructions:
After hair is cleaned and conditioned, begin applying quarter-sized amounts of Curl Definer Custard to hair in sections, from roots to ends. Rake your fingers through tresses until you see your desired definition. To help evenly distribute in thicker hair, keep a spray bottle handy and gently mist with water (add just enough to help manage each section). Set your style by sitting under a dryer for 25 minutes or allowing to air dry.

 Styling Suggestions:

This non-flaking, curl defining formula is perfect for finger-styling, taming unruly flyaways at edges and creating perfect coils. Kinky-Coily textures can expect to have greater elongation while maintaining fluffy frizz-free tresses. Excellent for wash & go styles created in the shower. Once dry, scrunch on our Shine & Silken Growth Oil to nourish and add instant sparkle to finished tresses.

Description: A trans-formative, clear, lightweight hair oil that works for all types of dry hair. This lightweight, quick-absorbing oil featuring a luxurious blend of six oils and two extracts soften, tame flyaway, and add shine immediately and over time. Hair looks and feels healthy, smooth, silky, and conditioned. Frizz and flyaway are dramatically reduced. This formula detangles hair and helps strengthen hair against breakage. It also contains UVA/UVB filters and offers heat styling protection. The clear-as-day formula can be used on all types (and colors) of hair.
Short Description: This trans-formative blend of nourishing oils vanishes into hair, leaving a smooth feather soft feel and a trace of shine.
Instructions: Work sparingly into damp hair before air drying or blow-drying, or smooth through dry hair for a sensational finish. Try it with Thickening Hairspray for a soft, tangle-free blow out, or as a finisher after styling to control flyaway and add polish.

Brand Description: Bumble and Bumble is a haven for like-minded talent, established by entrepreneurial stylist Michael Gordon in a salon on the fringe of New York's Hairdressers Row in 1977 where we clipped, combed, permed and styled our way into prominence with shrewd PR, a legendary editorial team, backstage access, a design ethic, a line of extraordinary products (as essential as scissors and comb), a devoted salon network, a school, a second salon, a reputation as a force for the recognition, evolution and elevation of hairdressing - revering hair heroes, cultivating creativity, fostering disciplined rebellion, refining our 'eye,' and above all remaining deeply, passionately and fearlessly dedicated to the craft of hairdressing.

Description: A creamy lightweight nourishing conditioner. Contains an optimal balance of botanical that deliver superior hydration without irritating sensitive scalps. Infused with refreshing mint herbaceous & nutty aromas. Hair appears suppler sleeker & more lustrous. Ideal for dry stressed or chemically treated hair.
Short Description: The ultimate hydrating and nourishing treatment to cleanse and tame belligerent hair. Containing a complex blend of botanical extracts, this formulation will leave hair shiny, moisturized and remarkably soft.
Instructions: Expel excess water from hair after shampooing. Dispense a single pump of conditioner into hands and apply to mid-lengths and ends of hair. Use a wide-toothed comb to ensure even distribution. Leave on hair for two to three minutes before rinsing thoroughly.

Brand Description:
Aesop was established in Melbourne in 1987 with a quest to create a range of superlative products for the skin, hair and body. We are committed to using both plant-based and laboratory-made ingredients of the highest quality and proven efficacy – particularly those with the greatest anti-oxidant properties. 
 
We value all human endeavors undertaken with intellectual rigor, vision, and a nod to the whimsical. Every Aesop product is made with the same attention to detail we believe should be applied to life at large, taking into consideration a diversity of needs as well as seasonal and environmental conditions.

Description: Scalps prone to irritation require specialized attention. This highly effective formulation pacifies the scalp, delivering beneficial hydrating plant extracts that possess excellent purifying properties.
Short Description: Pre shampoo treatment for dry, itchy and flaky scalps.
Instructions: Before showering, brush dry hair to loosen dirt and disentangle. Massage five drops onto scalp, allowing at least fifteen minutes to absorb. Follow by cleansing with preferred Aesop shampoo. This pre wash treatment can also be applied before bed and rinsed in the morning.

Description: We called it volumizing because all the other benefits-finishing on dry hair, curl enhancing and frizz fighting, style re-activator wouldn't fit. Hair gets volume, bounce and hold while feeling free of "stuff." This wake-up call for hair does the same for hair care, proving you can have style without faux fragrances, chemical preservatives and petro-ingredients. This multi-tasker is a traveler's must-have. Perfect for color-treated hair.
Short Description: Give even the finest hair extra body or help enhance waves and curls without any toxic chemicals or plasticizing agents. The USDA Certified Organic formula which is good for all hair types can be applied to wet or dry hair. It contains the antioxidant-rich Intellimune Seed Oil Complex blended with aloevera leaf juice, milk protein and acacia gum to help fortify hair while simultaneously giving you gorgeous style. Contains no petrochemicals, plasticizing agents or silicones. Has a light scent. Safe for color-treated hair.
Instructions: 1. Spray liberally on damp hair to create volume and body in fine hair--work through and diffuse to set, or allow to air dry. 2. Spray on dry hair for finishing and control. 3. For naturally wavy or curly textures, spray on wet or dry hair to enhance curl and reduce frizz. 4. Spray on dry hair to reactivate and reshape any style. 5. As a waterless hair-cleansing tonic between shampoos, massage into scalp, distribute through hair and blow dry or style.

Description:
Perfect for all hair types and textures, this all natural hair food contains thirteen essential oils, vitamins and botanical. The light serum delivers vitamins and nutrients into the hair's cortex.

The botanical help smooth the cuticle and allow the hair to naturally adjust to its own moisture level, which keeps the frizz down on humid days and seals in the moisture on dry days. This helps to eliminate breakage.
A few drops will go a long way and it will never leave hair oily or greasy or weigh down fine, limp hair.
This product works wonders when combined with a pea-sized amount of Nourish and Shine.
Short Description: This serum is designed to be used on all hair types and textures. It is extremely light and acts as a liposome to carry the vitamins into the cortex of your hair to strengthen and restore it. It’s a must for dry hair of all textures.
Instructions: Shake 1 to 2 drops into palm and apply to hair. Can be used on wet or dry hair.

Description:
The Cantu Hair and Scalp Oil provides your hair with intense nourishment, leaving it stronger and healthier. It is made with natural ingredients like pure shea oil, tea tree oil and jojoba oil, which gives it a natural shine, making it stronger and vibrant.

Deep penetrating oil

It is also great for repairing split ends and stopping breakage of the hair.

Just for you: For colored, dry, and damaged hair.

A Closer Look: The Cantu Hair and Scalp Oil forms a thermal barrier on the hair to prevent dryness and split ends. It also helps to protect your hair against heat and sun damage. It penetrates deep into the hair roots to make it strong and healthy.
You Won't Find: Sulphate
Short Description: Made with shea oil, tea tree oil and jojoba oil, Cantu No Drip Hair & Scalp Oil nourishes the hair and scalp, protects hair from heat damage and breakage and leaves hair smooth & shiny.
Instructions:
Daily styling--Massage a small amount into hair beginning at the roots to the ends. Comb through for even distribution. Do not rinse. Apply more to longer hair at the ends or problem areas.
Scalp Conditioner--Part hair into sections, revealing the scalp. Massage into scalp and hair 1-4 times a day. Do not rinse. Style as usual.

Hot Oil Treatment--Apply as directed for "Daily Styling." Roll, dry, or press section by section, to temporarily loosen or smooth resistant curls or stubborn waves.

Description: Avlon Conditioning Creme Relaxer conditions the hair before, during and after chemical processing as part of an innovative four-step relaxer system. Available formulas: Original in mild, normal and resistant strengths (Sodium Hydroxide). Fluffy, no-base formulations. Effectively straightens by chemically changing a third of the cystine crosslinks of the hair to lanthionine crosslinks. Rinses easily from the hair without leaving an oily residue. Benefits: Leaves hair silky-straight and well-conditioned for free flowing, soft silky hairstyles with body. Hair has a healthy-looking appearance. Hair is easy to comb and prepared for any type of styling. Hair looks radiant with lots of shine or sheen. Original formula is for stylists with a fast relaxer application technique.
Short Description: Affirm Creme Relaxer (Sodium Hydroxide Formula) is a breakthrough formula that retains 81% of the fiber elasticity. Technologically advanced formulas give you smoother more consistent straightening.

Description:
Dryness and breakage prevent healthy looking hair growth. To help ensure your hair has a fighting chance against daily styling stresses use Rapid Repair Deep Conditioner to help strengthen, rebuild, protect and hydrate.

Rapid Repair Deep Conditioner allows you to embrace more versatile styling options, while protecting your hair from the inside out. To achieve softer, more defined curls, healthier looking elongated coils and simply silky smooth hydrated hair use this feather lite deep penetrating conditioner.

Directions for Best Results

Help Control Damage and Add Brilliant Shine Every Day!

Saturate hair from roots to ends. Finger comb or use a wide tooth comb to ensure complete coverage. For thicker tresses use a detangling brush to ensure complete coverage. For deeper penetration cover hair with plastic cap and sit under dryer for 15 minutes. Rinse completely and style as desired. For tresses that are extremely damaged, over processed, or breaking hair, follow the steps above for 25 minutes. Can also be used as a leave-in conditioner.
Short Description: Dryness and breakage prevent healthy looking hair growth. To help ensure your hair has a fighting chance against daily styling stresses use Rapid Repair Deep Conditioner to help strengthen, rebuild, protect and hydrate.
Instructions:
For tighter natural curl pattern allow hair to air dry. For looser curl pattern and added volume, blow dry while finger combing and twisting curls. For straighter styles use a diffuser and/or blow-dry using a brush or wide-tooth comb.

Custom Blends: Mix & Match Products to create your own personal blend perfect for you!

    -For Your Unique Curl Repairing Experience!

For enhanced heat protection and shine add a few drops of Curly to Straight Silkener to the Deep Conditioner in the palm of your hand and follow directions.

For enhanced detangling add a small amount of Tangle Taming Leave-in Conditioner to Rapid Repair Deep Conditioner in the palm of your hand. Apply to hair and follow directions.
Ingredients: Enriched with Aloe Vera, Coconut, Olive, Soy, Argan Oil, Shea and Mango Butter.

Product Name: Lisa’s Hair Elixir Fortifying Scalp Spray
Description:
An exfoliating scalp spray that sheds away old layers as it washes away impurities from both the follicle and scalp.

Cedar Leaf soothes and calms an irritated scalp
Rosemary Oil strengthens scalp
Camphor Oil stimulates blood circulation for a healthier scalp

The only way to get healthy, beautiful hair is to nourish your hair through all three phases of growthfrom deep inside the follicle, along the scalp, and all over the hair strand. This deep purifying scalp spray takes care of the first two phases as it purifies hair at the root, within the follicle, and polishes away build-up from the scalp to ensure a healthier growing environment.
Short Description: An exfoliating scalp spray that sheds away old layers as it washes away impurities from both the follicle and scalp.
Instructions:
Before you shampoo, part your hair on the side, about half an inch above your hairline. Hold the FORTIFYING SCALP SPRAY about 4 inches away from your scalp and spray into the part until your scalp feels wet, but not soaking. Continue parting and spraying until you’ve covered your whole head. Gently massage your scalp and leave on your scalp for 5 minutes. Rinse your hair with warm water.

For Quick Relief from Itchy Scalp: Spray scalp spray directly on affected area, concentrating on spraying the scalp only and not your hair. Leave-in and allow to soothe throughout the day.

For ultimate Hair & Scalp Health, follow with Lisa’s Hair Elixir Restoring Hair Oil.
Ingredients:
- Cedar Leaf soothes and calms an irritated scalp
  - Rosemary Oil strengthens scalp
  - Camphor Oil stimulates blood circulation for a healthier scalp

A conditioning scalp and hair oil that moisturizes, soothes and rejuvenates both the follicle and scalp.

Peppermint Oil moisturizes both scalp and hair

Hot Oil Treatment: Before using, let the bottle sit in a cup of hot tap water for 3 minutes. Before wetting or shampooing, massage oil thoroughly through scalp and hair, concentrating on damaged areas. Rinse with warm water.

Deeper Conditioning: Cover head with a towel and leave on hair for 5 minutes. Rinse thoroughly with warm water and shampoo as usual.

For ultimate Hair & Scalp Health, start with Lisa’s Hair Elixir Fortifying Scalp Spray.

Brand Description: Lorraine Massey was born in Leichester, England, and started cutting hair in a local salon at age 13. "I went to the salon every day after school, and as often as I could on weekends. I couldn't get enough." At 16, she went to study with Martin Smith, the artistic director of Remi-Toni & Guy, and at 19, took her scissors and went traveling - to Hong Kong, Japan, and the Philippines - where she lived in a hut and cut hair on the beach. At 23, she came to New York, where she raised three children while establishing Devachan in Lower Manhattan, eventually teaming up with Denis DaSilva. Passionate about the cutting and caring of curly hair, Massey is the author of a hilarious how-to manifesto for the curly-haired, called "Curly Girl," (Workman Press, 2002)
Hair Style: Relaxed Straight Hair ,Naturally Curly Hair, Naturally Straight Hair

Description:
"Liquid Gold" for Your Hair!

Olive Oil has been used since thousands of years to cure dry, brittle hair. It has often been referred to as "liquid gold" for its miraculous healing properties. The Fantastia IC Olive Oil Sheen Spray is a fast drying, reflective high shine hair spray that contains Olive Oil for shaping, styling and finishing. It is a weightless formula which does not weigh down your hair. Its wonderful smell, great non sticky hold and quick drying, makes it a must have.

Perfect for dry, damaged hair
Easy on hair
Adds volume and body

It is humidity resistant and promotes great body, manageability, shine and volume.

Description:
Miss Jessie's Curly Butter creme is a moisturizing cream that is used for hair styling.
It's the most popular product in the Miss Jessie's line, and it's the only thing on the planet I've ever found that my thick, dry hair doesn't drink up within 5 seconds of putting it on.
It's full of Shea butter, and cone-free (although it contains mineral oil), and it isn't greasy at all.

Super moisturizing daily maintenance hydration creme softens like no other. Great for kids and adults who like a soft scented moisturizer. Excellent as a daily moisturizer after Curly Pudding, Curly Meringue or Stretch Silkening Creme. Banishes dry hair and adds a plump sheen to lifeless curls.
Short Description: Hath no fear BABY BUTTER CREME is here to rescue kids, mommies and daddies from knotty, dried out tangled kinks and curls. This splendid moisture blend is essential for softening and growing out natural hair. Shh........ On the hush, grownups looking for a softer scented alternative to Curly Butter creme will love it too! ULTRA HYDRATING HAIR DRESS FOR DRY PARCHED KINKS AND CURLS. Instructions for use: Apply a nickel sized dollop to instantly soften dry, crunchy curls. Excellent for taming hairline edges, moisturizing pony puffs, two strand twists, coils, braids, cornrows, naturals. Great for: Kids, 2 Strand Twists, Pony Puffs, Braids, Hairline Grooming Creme, Short Naturals and Fades, Growing out Natural Hair.
Instructions: Apply a nickel sized dollop to instantly soften dry, crunchy curls. Excellent for taming hairline edges, moisturizing pony puffs, two strand twists, coils, braids, cornrows, naturals.
Ingredients: Water, Petrolatum, Glycerin, Mineral Oil, Fragrance, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Acetylated Lanolin, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil, Panthenol, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Keratin, Hydrolyzed Keratin, PEG-8 Dilaurate, Ceteareth-20, Stearyl Alcohol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Disodium EDTA, Triethanolamine, DMDM Hydantoin, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Caramel, Yellow 5 (CI 19140).
Brand Description: Founded by sisters Miko and Titi Branch, Miss Jessies Products took the curly hair market by storm in 2004! Armed with curly hair product development from their salon/workshop, they were able to perfect their curly hair product performance. Known for its expertise in styling curly, kinky, and wavy hair of all types and textures, Miss Jessies Salon became the go to place for curly hair solutions. Titi and Miko, inspired by their grandmother and her can-do attitude decided to perfect their own curly hair product creations and Miss Jessie was born.

Our raw natural Shea Butter is sustainably sourced in Africa. This rich, super moisturizing ingredient is the building block for healthy, protected hair. Palmer's Shea Formula Moisture Repair Curl Shampoo is a nourishing, sulfate-free shampoo that helps moisturize and repair hair.

Specially formulated for Curly, Natural and Transitioning Hair.

Description: What it is: A saltwater-based styling spray. What it does: This styling spray adds volume and texture to the hair to create a sexy, wind-blown feel. Its salt-infused formula adds fullness, hold, and a cool, matte finish. Salt water is no secret to editorial stylists for adding volume and texture, and anyone who has been in the ocean knows of that salty, sexy, sun-dried, wind-styled feel (that seems such a shame to wash out). So while Bumble and bumble hasn't exactly bottled the real thing, they've replicated and improved it, including seaweed and kelp extracts to enhance moisture. What else you need to know: Excellent for wavy types and landlocked surfers with winter blues, this spray adds body to fine hair and adds a nice texture for silver hair.
Short Description: Rekindle summer with the sexy, wild, wind-styled texture you get after an ocean swim.
Instructions: Work through damp or dry hair; let dry naturally or blow-dry with a diffuser. Try it with Grooming Creme for sexy definition, Thickening Hairspray for beachy volume, or Color Minded UV Protective Styling Balm for windswept softness.
Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Magnesium Sulfate, Macrocystic Pyrifera Extract (Kelp), Algae Extract (Algae), Isoceteth 20, Potassium Sorbate, Propylene Glycol, Citric Acid, DMDM Hydantoin, Fragrance (Parfum)

In 1989, Bumble and bumble invented Thickening Hairspray, which would become an indispensable setting spray in our hairdressers kits for instant lift-off, hold, and versatility with heat tools. Thickening Shampoo and Conditioner soon followed to start building fullness in the shower, creating a trio with a cult following.

Plus, it has variable heat and speed settings that allow you to customize the dryer to fit your hair type and achieve salon-quality styles.
Quiet and powerful long-lasting motor

Featuring a powerful 1875-watt AC motor, the 270 creates high airflow for quick drying and minimal heat exposure. The AC motor lasts longer than standard DC motors, and its removable filter prevents damaging lint buildup, so the motor life is extended even further. Plus, the heavy-duty motor remains whisper-quiet during use.
Tourmaline Ceramic and Ion Technology give you healthy, silky results

Designed with both tourmaline ceramic and ion technology, the 270 allows you to achieve smooth, frizz-free hair without damage. Tourmaline ceramic heat emits natural ions for static-free hair and reduces hot spots to the hair shaft. Ionic technology helps enhance your hair's natural shine and eliminates frizz for healthy-looking, smooth results.

Product Name: Krly Kids Pump & Go Spray Gel
Description:
"Wheat proteins and polymers instantly nourish, calm and reshape delicate 
kids' curls, making hair more manageable and easier-to-style.

Key Product Benefits
        Helps refresh, reshape and calm delicate curlsNourishes, defines and holds curls without a heavy feel or residueEasy to apply, perfect for kids on the move and on the go
    
        When it comes to kids and curls, parents often don't know how to care for, manage and style curly hair, as Ouidad herself experienced

in childhood.  Without the proper education, understanding and tools, curly kids cannot feel positive or confident about their curls.
 

Pump & Go Spray Gel is a kid-friendly, nourishing curl reshaping spray that calms misbehaving curls and helps restore a healthy curl pattern.  Water-

soluble Wheat proteins and polymers bind to curls, restoring elasticity to prevent breakage and make curls more manageable and easier to style.  

Works on the go with fast results so kids can achieve style easily for instant curl confidence.  And because Ouidad loves kids, we donate $1 for every Krly Kids product purchased on ouidad.com to fight Breast Cancer, so that someday, no child will have to lose a parent to this disease. "
Short Description: KRLY Pump & Go Spray Gel for kids contains special wheat proteins that calm out of control curls, making them supremely manageable and easy-to-style while blocking out frizz-causing humidity. Easy spray on application is perfect for the kid on the go. A kid's life is complicated enough. Ouidad makes curl care easy for kids.

Description:
TRESemm Keratin Smooth Shampoo transforms your hair to be smoother and easier to style. Infused with Keratin it rescues hair from the brink of unruly despair. Containing lower sulphates compared to other TRESemm products, TRESemm Keratin Smooth Shampoo leaves hair clean, shiny and manageable.

Cleanses Hair While Reducing Frizz
Transform unruly frizz into lustrous locks with this keratin-infused shampoo. When used with Keratin Infusing Conditioner, this low-sulfate (compared to TRESemm Smooth & Silky Shampoo) shampoo helps you achieve smooth, manageable hair for up to 48 hours (versus non-conditioning shampoo).

The TRESemm Keratin Smooth Collection
Keratin Smooth products from TRESemm, infused with keratin, a protein that is the main component of hair and nails, leave hair sleek and shiny while eliminating frizz. Products from this line help transform hair from root to tip, allowing you to achieve smooth results at home.

This collection of hair care products includes Keratin Infusing Shampoo and Conditioner, Keratin Smooth Heat Protection Shine Spray, and Keratin Infusing Smoothing Serum.
Short Description: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo transforms your hair to be smoother and easier to style. Infused with Keratin it rescues hair from the brink of unruly despair. Containing lower sulphates compared to other TRESemmé products, TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo leaves hair clean, shiny and manageable.
Instructions:
Apply to wet hair and gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips. Lather.
    Lightly squeeze the shampoo from roots to ends and rinse thoroughly.
    Finish with TRESemmé Keratin Infusing Conditioner.
    For protection from heat styling tools use Keratin Smooth Heat Protection Shine Spray before styling.
Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glyerin, Potassium Chloride, Dimethiconol, Fragrance (Parfum), Carbomber, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Glycol Distearate, Citric Acid, Tetrasodium EDTA, DMDM Hydantoin, Hydrolyzed Keratin, PEG 45M, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, PPG 9, Mica (CI 77019), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)

    Medium-Length Hair: Apply a quarter-size amount, starting at the ends and working up to the mid-shaft
    Especially Long/Thick Hair: Apply two quarter-size amounts, starting at the ends and working up to the mid-shaft

Description: This hair oil treatment for dry, damaged hair, with custom-blended Cupuau & Brazilnut oil, nourishes and helps repair.
Short Description: Adds Shine Without Greasy Residue, With Cupuacu & Brazilnut Oil, Repairs Dry, Damaged Hair, 5-Action Hair Elixir
Instructions:
Marvelous Oil can be used in any of 5 ways! Try a different use each day.

1. Pre-Shampoo Treatment: Apply to hair (wet or dry) before shampooing to help prime hair locks for gentle cleaning.
2. Boost Conditioning: Add 1 or 2 drops to your conditioner to help get rid of pesky knots and tangles.
3. Blow-Dry Protector: Apply to damp to help protect when blow drying.
4. Finish With Hi-Watt Shine: Apply to damp or dry ends to help smooth split ends and tame flyaways.
5. Treat Hair Overnight: To restore softness while you sleep, work into wet or dry hair and leave in overnight.
